title.narrative: Payment into European Union Trust Fund for Syria (Madad fund)

description.narrative: This activity (Payment into European Union Trust Fund for Syria (Madad fund)) is a component of UK contribution to EU Madad Trust Fund for the Syria Crisis reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £3,000,000. This component benefits Middle East, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Health policy and administrative management, Water sector policy and administrative management, Material relief assistance and services . , with the following implementing partners: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development. The start date is 23-05-2016 and the end date is 18-04-2017.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Cooperation and Development

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
